title: All the Backlist! May 17, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including We Need New Names.
This episode is sponsored by We Hunt the Flame by Hafsah Faizal and Fierce Reads.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
We Contain Multitudes by Sarah Henstra
We Hunt the Flame by Hafsah Faizal
Once More We Saw Stars by Jayson Greene
On Earth We’re Briefly Gorgeous by Ocean Vuong
We Have Always Lived in the Castle by Shirley Jackson
We Are Never Meeting in Real Life: Essays by Samantha Irby
We Eat Our Own by Kea Wilson
We Don’t Eat Our Classmates by Ryan Higgins
We Need New Names by Noviolet Bulawayo
Will My Cat Eat My Eyeballs?: Big Questions from Tiny Mortals About Death by Caitlin Doughty
Smoke Gets In Your Eyes by Caitlin Doughty
From Here to Eternity by Caitlin Doughty
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
